availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David L. L. McGaha (Calloway County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Louisa J. McGaha. Farmer in St. Francis County, Arkansas, in 1860. Farmer in Calloway County, Kentucky, in June 1863. Indicted for grand larceny in Calloway County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Arkansas, St. Francis County, Johnson, p. 386.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Calloway County, KY, June 1863, p. 15.
KYR-0001-006-0083.
